column2: IDEA-205629 Shift text range when getStartTagNameElement is null

column3:
Apply necessary range shift both to startToken and original tag to avoid
¡°Argument rangeInElement ¡­ endOffset must not exceed descriptor text range¡±

This was marked as fixed in YouTrack (https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-205629). It may be worth closing this issue as well. (I'm still having trouble finding the github commit that resolves the issue though)
